mapper.update: /* ncis.sql.cmn.rnIpBndPrpos.updateRnIpBndPrpos */ UPDATE RN_IP_BND_PRPOS SET BND_SEQ = #{bndSeq} /* 대역SEQ */ , PRPOS_CL_CD = #{prposClCd} /* 용도구분코드 */ WHERE BND_SEQ = #{bndSeq} /* 대역SEQ */ AND PRPOS_CL_CD = #{prposClCd} /* 용도일련번호 */
mapper.delete: /* ncis.sql.cmn.rnIpBndPrpos.deleteRnIpBndPrpos */ DELETE FROM RN_IP_BND_PRPOS WHERE BND_SEQ = #{bndSeq} /* 대역SEQ */ AND PRPOS_CL_CD = #{prposClCd} /* 용도일련번호 */
